الامارات مرحلة جديدة لعبور المستقبل The Council will be led by a 22 year-old female Minister of State. The energy of youth will fuel our government in future
#WorldGovSummit The newly created UAE Youth National Council will include an elite group of young men and women to advise on youth affairs
#WorldGovSummit The Council will review national policy for science, technology and innovation to develop a new generation of scientists
#WorldGovSummit The UAE Council of Scientists will be established as an advisory body, and will include leading researchers and academics
#WorldGovSummit The post of Minister of State for Tolerance has been created to promote tolerance as a fundamental value in UAE society
#WorldGovSummit The Ministry of Cabinet Affairs, tasked with future strategies, becomes the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs and The Future.
#WorldGovSummit The Ministry of Development and International Cooperation will merge with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
#WorldGovSummit We merged the National Tourism Council and the Ministry of the Economy, and developed national GDP targets for the sector #WorldGovSummit Managing climate change makes the Ministry of Environment and Water, into the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment
#WorldGovSummit A new post, Minister of State for Happiness, will align and drive government policy to create social good and satisfaction.
#WorldGovSummit Focusing on Emirati family and society, the Ministry of Social Affairs will become the Ministry for Community Development.
#WorldGovSummit The Marriage Fund will be merged into the Ministry of Social Affairs. Nurseries will fall under the Ministry of Education.
#WorldGovSummit We are also reforming the Ministry of Labour to better manage the UAE workforce in this new era of development.
#WorldGovSummit An independent entity will oversee public hospitals in the UAE: a structural change
to the Ministry of Health's portfolio.

#WorldGovSummit We have established the Higher Education and Human Resources
Council to restructure the development of our human resources

#WorldGovSummit We are creating the Emirates Schools Establishment to manage public schools as an
 autonomous, semi-independent authority.

#WorldGovSummit The changes include merging the Ministries of Education and Higher Education, with
 two state ministers in support.

#WorldGovSummit The new government will have less Ministries, with more Ministers able to manage
 changing and dynamic strategic portfolios

#WorldGovSummit The President of the UAE has approved the largest structural change in the history
 of our federal government.
